main event: A sighting of a blue-white light with long contrails occurred on July 26, 1948.
interesting points: The object was observed in Chamblee, Georgia., The formation was described as a single moving blue-white light., The object was reported to have long contrails., The direction of the object's movement was southeast then turning south., The report was sourced from the Naval Air Station.
sighted object: one blue-white light with long contrails
